content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find this apartment to be a great place to live. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As I am a student, I am looking for the lowest possible price. However, I am smart and can assure you that I am dependable and responsible. I will also follow all moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, and I am willing to negotiate to get the best price for this apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's great to hear, Farhad. It's important to me that my tenants are not only financially responsible but also respectful of the property and their neighbors. I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us. How about we start with the market rate and see if we can come to an agreement? The market rate for a similar apartment in this area is around 800 Euro per month. Does that seem fair to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite high for me as a student. I am willing to pay 600 Euro per month. I understand that this is lower than the market rate, but I hope that we can find a compromise that works for both of us.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Farhad, but 600 Euro is significantly lower than what I'm looking for. How about we meet in the middle? I'll reduce the price to 750 Euro per month, and in exchange, you agree to maintain the apartment well and not disturb the neighbors. Does this seem more fair to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Herr Schmidt. I am willing to pay 700 Euro per month. I will treat your apartment with care and respect. I will also make sure that I do not disturb the neighbors. I believe that this is a fair compromise.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hmm, 700 Euro is still lower than what I had in mind. However, considering your commitment to maintaining the apartment and respecting the neighbors, I'm willing to accept your offer. We have a deal at 700 Euro per month. Remember, the apartment is unfurnished, so you'll need to provide all your own furniture. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euro per month! Thank you for your understanding and for considering my offer. I will provide all the necessary furniture and will take good care of the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. Just to clarify, the monthly rent will be 700 Euro, and you will be responsible for furnishing the apartment. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we finalize the lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have already agreed upon the rental price and other terms. We can now finalize the lease.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Understood, Farhad. Since we have agreed on the price and terms, there's no need to continue negotiating. Let's proceed with finalizing the lease. I'll have my lawyer prepare the documents, and we can meet again to sign them. Is there anything specific you would like to include in the lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have already agreed upon the rental price and other terms. Let's now focus on finalizing the lease.

[Riley]: With a sense of urgency, I announce to the group, "Hey, everyone, meet me in the auditorium after school. We have a big announcement."
